ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Were you grouped with anyone?  If you were grouped with someone who was KOS to the frogs, and your song pulses on them, the frogs perceive you as helping
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, JasonF wrote:
>
> Um.. My bard is agnostic, so unless the frogs are upset
> about that fact, that doesn't resolve my question either.

Were you grouped with anyone? If you were grouped with
someone who was KOS to the frogs, and your song pulses on
them, the frogs perceive you as helping someone KOS to them,
thus making you KOS to them.

Then there's that ridiculous bard bug, where you take faction
hits (and thus mobs become aggressive to you) for simply
standing nearby watching someone else kill a mob.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
